Zach Ratkai

Contributor

Zach Ratkai is the Administrative and Community Services Director for the City of Pasco, Washington where he facilitates a variety of divisions from Parks to IT to Indigent Defense. He is also a facilitator and strategic planning consultant with his own firm, Sageland Strategic. Zach holds a Masterâ€™s in Public Administration from the University of Colorado at Denver.
